briefdescription.para: Macro for extracting codec type from codec ID.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* PalCodecDataInCback_t) (uint16_t id, uint32_t pktCtr, uint32_t ts, uint8_t *pData, uint16_t actLen)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint16_t id, uint32_t pktCtr, uint32_t ts, uint8_t *pData, uint16_t actLen)
memberdef.name: PalCodecDataInCback_t

parameterdescription.para: Coding format, search key for info.
Number of info elements, returns number of codecs found.
Vendor Specific Codec ID, search key for pCap.

simplesect.para: true if capability found, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para:
pNumStd
Input is size of stdCodecs and output is actual number of standard codecs.
stdCodecs
Standard codec info.
pNumVs
Input is size of vsCodecs and output is actual number of vendor specific codecs.
vsCodecs
Vendor specific codec info.
This function is called by HCI when the host invokes HCI_Read_Local_Supported_Codecs.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t codingFmt, uint16_t compId, uint16_t vsCodecId, PalCodecDir_t dir, uint8_t transType, uint8_t *pCapLen, uint8_t *pCap)
memberdef.name: PalCodecReadLocalSupportedCodecCapabilities

detaileddescription.para:
codingFmt
Coding format.
compId
Company ID.
vsCodecId
Vendor specific codec ID.
dir
Direction.
transType
Transport type.
pCapLen
Input is size of pCap and output is actual size copied into pCap.
pCap
Capability buffer return parameter.
true if valid, false otherwise.
This function is called by HCI when the host invokes HCI_Read_Local_Supported_Codec_Capabilities.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t codingFmt, uint16_t compId, uint16_t vsCodecId, PalCodecDir_t dir, uint8_t transType, uint32_t *pMinDly, uint32_t *pMaxDly)
memberdef.name: PalCodecReadLocalSupportedControllerDelay

detaileddescription.para:
codingFmt
Coding format.
compId
Company ID.
vsCodecId
Vendor specific codec ID.
dir
Direction.
transType
Transport type.
pMinDly
Min_Controller_Delay return value.
pMaxDly
Max_Controller_Delay return value.
true if valid, false otherwise.
This function is called by HCI when the host invokes HCI_Read_Local_Supported_Controller_Delay.

dir
Direction.
vsCfgLen
Length of pVsCfg buffer.
pVsCfg
Vendor specific configuration buffer.
true if valid, false otherwise.
This function is called by the LL when the host invokes HCI_Configure_Data_Path with a Data_Path_ID=1 (LL_ISO_DATA_PATH_VS).
The contents of pVsCfg contains a single byte which resolves the PCM buffer mode, palCodecMode_t.

parameterdescription.para: New input gain value in dB.

detaileddescription.para:
id
Stream ID.
pParam
Stream parameters.
true if successful, false otherwise.
This function is called by the LL when the host invokes HCI_LE_Setup_ISO_Data_Path with a Data_Path_ID=1 (LL_ISO_DATA_PATH_VS).

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t id, uint8_t *pBuf, uint16_t len, uint32_t sduRef)
memberdef.name: PalCodecDataStreamIn

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t id, const uint8_t *pBuf, uint16_t len, uint32_t sduRef)
memberdef.name: PalCodecDataStreamOut
